original:
The Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence (SETI) and Communication with Extraterrestrial Intelligence (CETI) are fields dedicated to the exploration of signals from intelligent extraterrestrial civilizations. SETI primarily focuses on the detection of signals using radio and optical telescopes, while CETI emphasizes the composition and interpretation of messages that could be comprehensible to other technological civilizations.

Huma
sampled: The Search for Celestial Intelligence (SETI) and Communication with Extraterrestrial Intelligence (CETI) are fields dedicated to the exploration of frequencies from intelligent supernal civilizations. Venture primarily monitors on the detection of signals using radio and optical telescopes, on CETI emphasizes the composition and insight of messages that should be comprehensible to other technological civilizations. Huma
